trans:
[redacted_url]
ğŸ“ŒSmall tips from the video
1. Meilin Worcestershire Sauce is also known as Worcestershire Sauce. If you donâ€™t have it, you can â€˜more or lessâ€™ substitute it with black vinegar!
2. You can use cooked pasta or oil noodles.
3. If you make more black pepper sauce, you can seal it and freeze it for about 2-3 months. Just defrost and heat it before use. You can refrigerate for about 2 weeks if it does not touch any water.
4. Please adjust the cooking time according to the doneness of the steak.
5. Some people use flour to thicken instead of using starch water.
